verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7462><s%>, even to the shepherds, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that do feed <S%H7462><s%> themselves <S%H7462><s%>! should not the shepherds feed <S%H7462><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%>?

Ye eat <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%>, and ye clothe <S%H3847><s%> you with the wool <S%H6785><s%>, ye kill <S%H2076><s%> the fatlings <S%H1277><s%>; but ye feed <S%H1277><s%> not the sheep <S%H6629><s%>.

The diseased <S%H2470><s%> have ye not strengthened <S%H2388><s%>, neither have ye healed <S%H7495><s%> that which was sick <S%H2470><s%>, neither have ye bound up <S%H2280><s%> that which was broken <S%H7665><s%>, neither have ye brought back <S%H7725><s%> that which was driven away <S%H5080><s%>, neither have ye sought <S%H1245><s%> that which was lost <S%H6><s%>; but with force <S%H2394><s%> and with rigor <S%H6531><s%> have ye ruled over them <S%H7287><s%>.

And they were scattered <S%H6327><s%>, because there was no shepherd <S%H7462><s%>; and they became food <S%H402><s%> to all the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and were scattered <S%H6327><s%>.

My sheep <S%H6629><s%> wandered <S%H7686><s%> through all the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and upon every high <S%H7311><s%> hill <S%H1389><s%>: yea <S%H6629><s%>, my sheep were scattered <S%H6327><s%> upon all the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; and there was none that did search <S%H1875><s%> or seek after them <S%H1245><s%>.
Therefore <S%H7462><s%>, ye shepherds, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:

As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>, surely forasmuch as my sheep <S%H6629><s%> became a prey <S%H957><s%>, and my sheep <S%H6629><s%> became food <S%H402><s%> to all the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, because there was no shepherd <S%H7462><s%>, neither did my shepherds <S%H7462><s%> search <S%H1875><s%> for my sheep <S%H6629><s%>, but the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> fed <S%H7462><s%> themselves <S%H7462><s%>, and fed not my sheep <S%H6629><s%>;
therefore <S%H7462><s%>, ye shepherds, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Behold <S%H7462><s%>, I am against the shepherds; and I will require <S%H1875><s%> my sheep <S%H6629><s%> at their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and cause them to cease <S%H7673><s%> from feeding <S%H7462><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%>; neither shall the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> themselves any more <S%H5337><s%>; and I will deliver my sheep <S%H6629><s%> from their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, that they may not be food for them <S%H402><s%>.
For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Behold <S%H1875><s%>, I myself, even I, will search for my sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and will seek them out <S%H1239><s%>.

As a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> seeketh out <S%H1243><s%> his flock <S%H5739><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he is among <S%H8432><s%> his sheep <S%H6629><s%> that are scattered <S%H6567><s%> abroad <S%H1239><s%>, so will I seek out my sheep <S%H6629><s%>; and I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> them out of all places <S%H4725><s%> whither they have been scattered <S%H6327><s%> in the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> and dark <S%H6205><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And I will bring them out <S%H3318><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> them from the countries <S%H776><s%>, and will bring <S%H935><s%> them into their own land <S%H127><s%>; and I will feed <S%H7462><s%> them upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, by the watercourses <S%H650><s%>, and in all the inhabited places <S%H4186><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%>.

I will feed <S%H7462><s%> them with good <S%H2896><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%>; and upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of the height <S%H4791><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall their fold <S%H5116><s%> be <S%H7257><s%>: there shall they lie down in a good <S%H2896><s%> fold <S%H5116><s%>; and on fat <S%H8082><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%> shall they feed <S%H7462><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
I myself will be the shepherd <S%H7462><s%> of my sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and I will cause them to lie down <S%H7257><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

I will seek <S%H1245><s%> that which was lost <S%H6><s%>, and will bring back <S%H7725><s%> that which was driven away <S%H5080><s%>, and will bind up <S%H2280><s%> that which was broken <S%H7665><s%>, and will strengthen <S%H2388><s%> that which was sick <S%H2470><s%>: but the fat <S%H8082><s%> and the strong <S%H2389><s%> I will destroy <S%H8045><s%>; I will feed <S%H7462><s%> them in justice <S%H4941><s%>.

And as for you <S%H859><s%>, O my flock <S%H6629><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Behold <S%H8199><s%>, I judge between sheep <S%H7716><s%> and sheep <S%H7716><s%>, the rams <S%H352><s%> and the he-goats <S%H6260><s%>.

Seemeth it a small thing <S%H4592><s%> unto you to have fed <S%H7462><s%> upon the good <S%H2896><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%>, but ye must tread down <S%H7429><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%> the residue <S%H3499><s%> of your pasture <S%H4829><s%>? and to have drunk <S%H8354><s%> of the clear <S%H4950><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, but ye must foul <S%H7515><s%> the residue <S%H3498><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%>?

And as for my sheep <S%H6629><s%>, they eat <S%H7462><s%> that which ye have trodden <S%H4823><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%>, and they drink <S%H8354><s%> that which ye have fouled <S%H4833><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%> unto them <S%H8199><s%>: Behold, I, even I, will judge between the fat <S%H1274><s%> sheep <S%H7716><s%> and the lean <S%H7330><s%> sheep <S%H7716><s%>.

Because ye thrust <S%H1920><s%> with side <S%H6654><s%> and with shoulder <S%H3802><s%>, and push <S%H5055><s%> all the diseased <S%H2470><s%> with your horns <S%H7161><s%>, till ye have scattered <S%H6327><s%> them abroad <S%H2351><s%>;
therefore will I save <S%H3467><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%>, and they shall no more be a prey <S%H957><s%>; and I will judge <S%H8199><s%> between sheep <S%H7716><s%> and sheep <S%H7716><s%>.

And I will set up <S%H6965><s%> one <S%H259><s%> shepherd <S%H7462><s%> over them <S%H7462><s%>, and he shall feed them <S%H5650><s%>, even my servant David <S%H1732><s%>; he shall feed <S%H7462><s%> them <S%H7462><s%>, and he shall be their shepherd.

And I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, will be their God <S%H430><s%>, and my servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>; I, Jehovah, have spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.

And I will make <S%H3772><s%> with them a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>, and will cause evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>; and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and sleep <S%H3462><s%> in the woods <S%H3293><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> them and the places round about <S%H5439><s%> my hill <S%H1389><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%>; and I will cause the shower <S%H1653><s%> to come down <S%H3381><s%> in its season <S%H6256><s%>; there shall be showers <S%H1653><s%> of blessing <S%H1293><s%>.

And the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> its fruit <S%H6529><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> its increase <S%H2981><s%>, and they shall be secure <S%H983><s%> in their land <S%H127><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the bars <S%H4133><s%> of their yoke <S%H5923><s%>, and have delivered <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those that made bondmen of them <S%H5647><s%>.

And they shall no more be a prey <S%H957><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%>, neither shall the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> devour <S%H398><s%> them <S%H3427><s%>; but they shall dwell securely <S%H983><s%>, and none shall make them afraid <S%H2729><s%>.

And I will raise up <S%H6965><s%> unto them a plantation <S%H4302><s%> for renown <S%H8034><s%>, and they shall be no more consumed <S%H622><s%> with famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, neither bear <S%H5375><s%> the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the nations any more <S%H1471><s%>.

And they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, their God <S%H430><s%> am with them <S%H1004><s%>, and that they, the house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, are my people <S%H5971><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

And ye <S%H859><s%> my sheep <S%H6629><s%>, the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of my pasture <S%H4830><s%>, are men <S%H120><s%>, and I am your God <S%H430><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
